intro.description:
Prerequsites:
Create project with data
Load detector information

item.title: Inspect calibration results (recommended)
item.description: Running data reduction on the calibration dataset is a good reference of success of calibration procedures.

subitem.label: Check that "2. Sector Integration" stage is selected in "NCD Data Reduction Parameters" view. If detector mask was used select "Apply detector mask" option is "Detectors" panel.
Select file with the calibration image in the "Project Explorer" and right-click on it. Select "NCD > Run Data Reduction" from the popup menu.
Plot and inspect data from the results file opened in the editor area after data reduction completes.

If detector mask was enabled it will be stored in "entry1/detectorName_processing/SectorIntegration/mask" field. The results file can be used to load this information back into DAWN workbench by selecting results file in "Project Explorer" and selecting "NCD > Load detector mask" option from the popup menu.

item.title: Specify experiment type
item.description: Select SAXS checkboxes in "NCD Detector parameters" view to process SAXS data. Select 2D switch for detector dimension and specify pixel size (if not preloaded).

item.title: Specifying data processing results directory
item.description: Specify directory where data processing results will be stored in the "Directory" field in the "NCD Data Reduction Parameters" view. This directory can be selected by pressing adjacent "..." button and selecting the directory from the dialog.

item.title: Select Sector Integration stage
item.description: "Sector Integration" pipeline stages can be selected with the corresponding checkbox in "Data Reduction Pipeline" panel.

item.title: Specifying Sector Integration parameters
item.description: Under "Sector Integration Parameters" select following options

subitem.label: Enable calculation of radial profile select corresponding checkbox.
If detector mask is avaliable, select "Apply Detector Mask" checkbox.

item.title: Run sector integration stage
item.description: Select data file with calibration image in "Project Explorer" view, right-click on it and select "NCD > Run Data Reduction" menu option.

item.title: Inspect sector integration result
item.description: Data reduction results are stored in output directory in results_detectorname_DDMMYY_HHMMSS_inputfilename.nxs file under "/entry1/detectorname_result/data" node. Double-click on this node to plot it in the "Dataset Plot" view. Using "Peak Fitting" tool from "Plotting Tools" button on the toolbar fit calibration peak position and compare with reference values.
